title: >>> Rims to HUMANS
body_text:
Earlier this week, it was announced here on
dodgeball.livejournal.com
that one of the tenacious women on the current dodgeball poster has issued an open challenge for the forthcoming event, DODGEBALL LVIII.
As the news broke, the dodgeball world stood in awe. Who could it possibly be? That question WILL NOT be answered until after a certain "game". Get ready as a version of the popular Rimshot Contest will make it's debut!
..................
It's called the "HTH" Pre-game contest. "HTH" means "Hit the Human", as one volunteer player will stand* in place for what would usually be the wooden targets designed by legend Ryan Letsche. In this case obviously, the object would be to hit the human pawn rather than the wooden rim itself. Like the rimshot contests of past, this will be elimination style, with the last person remaining getting a shot at the female who issued the challenge that has sparked a great deal of buzz.
*Similar to that of Chris Adams against the fence in early Season 6 before the events themself were under way.
DODGEBALL LVIII Simplified Rundown
I.
The all-new "HTH Contest", with the winner becoming one-half of the captain's showdown.
II.
The other half of the equation announced: Which "Female Titan" is it?
III.
Let the war begin!
Any Idea?
Take a guess, who is it?
1. Kathryn Nogueira
2. Alison Bertsch
3. Sara DeCuir
4. Aimee Savoth
5. Christina Guarino
6. Lauren Freda
7. Lauren Stopa
8. Diana DiBuccio
9. Lauren Winston
10. Elizabeth Nogueira
11. Melissa Kerr
12. Valerie Winston
There is a 1 in 12 chance, with your odds only increasing by LVIII's arrival.
